welcome_paragraph: Renewable energy is part of the fightback against climate change,the purpose of this project is to investigate and leverage data within the energy sector to produce smarter models of the UK's green energy. It aims to 'work smarter, not harder' with the current renewable energy capacity, allowing consumers to make informed decisions about their usage.
secondary_paragraph: Some suggested uses of this information include:
suggested_usage: Finding optimum time to charge electric vehical
Reducing energy bill by using domestic energy (washing machine, cooker etc.) during peak production times
Balancing the national grid to reduce reliance on dirtier methods of electricty production
footer_about: Final Year Project produced by George Downer as part of my Computer Science Degree at the University of Plymouth.
